page.title: 14Rev.Richerby/S.Wigston
page.content: St.Thomas' Church S.Wigston is built of red brick and stands at the junction of Saffron Road and Blaby Road.The Vicar and his family live in a big house with thirteen rooms.Some are used for meetings.The Reverend Richerby's vicarage garden is next to our playground so we can hear his fantail doves and they make us feel peaceful and happy.He has a cat called Sophie.When he was at school he wanted to be an engineer but at about sixteen he felt God was calling him.He enjoys swimming and goes to Edinburgh and Dorset for his holidays.Dr.Holmes and Rev.Morton help him to run daily services.He works from his study.Some of the groups using the church building are:choir,Sunday School,Cubs and Brownies,family groups,senior citizens,Women's Fellowship, drama and bell ringers.(By:{Parklands School)}.
